channel.title: Assassinate The Priest!
channel.description:
#### What happened? The game allowed me to choose the name "Assassin" as a nickname.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? It say "Name unavailable" as Assassin is a class. All other classes, that I know of, are blocked already.
#### Steps to reproduce: Type "Assassin" in the Name field when the game starts.
#### Comments: Assassin the Priest ;)
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/372019962727890955/unknown.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/372020290458353665/unknown.png https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/372020362986389504/unknown.png
I posted this prior-to, in the Discord, but heaven knows everything gets lost in the vacuum of spam in there o-o

item.title: Assassinate The Priest!
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
What happened? The game allowed me to choose the name “Assassin” as a nickname.

What was SUPPOSED to happen? It say “Name unavailable” as Assassin is a class. All other classes, that I know of, are blocked already.

Steps to reproduce: Type “Assassin” in the Name field when the game starts.

Comments: Assassin the Priest

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/372019962727890955/unknown.png

I posted this prior-to, in the Discord, but heaven knows everything gets lost in the vacuum of spam in there o-o
